availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard Thompson Ryan (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ryan. Father of John P. Ryan, Margaret Ryan, Selena Ryan, Sarah Ryan, Mary Ryan, Richard Ryan, Perry Ryan, Rebecca Susan Ryan, Lucy Ryan, and Andrew Jackson Ryan. Farmer in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 137A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 493.
